properties.description: We cater for any age. Trained listeners are available to arrange formal listening sessions if someone has anything that is worrying them that they would like to talk about. properties.description: Open from 07/11/2022. We thrive on our motto 'We are a Centre for All' We are a very welcoming Community Centre in Edinburgh. properties.title: Oxgangs Neighbourhood Centre SCIO
